## Description {#details}

Emulate <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;CondState&gt;</a> with a pair of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitvector">BitVector</a>.

<CodeBlock>     True  False DontCare (Impossible)
</CodeBlock> Values: True False False True Visited: True True False False

Definition at line 404 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/profiledata/include/llvm/profiledata/coverage/coveragemapping-h">CoverageMapping.h</a>.

## Public Member Functions

### getDifferences() {#aed7a4c94015e69c2f8b786c2fee0f953}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>auto llvm::coverage::MCDCRecord::TestVector::getDifferences (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord/testvector">TestVector</a> &amp; B) const</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
For each element:

<ul>
<li>False if either is DontCare</li>
<li>False if both have the same value</li>
<li>True if both have the opposite value ((A.Values ^ B.Values) &amp; A.Visited &amp; B.Visited) Dedicated to <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coverage/mcdcrecord/#a75f33335df18ebee49fbe5b2d5b664a0">findIndependencePairs()</a>.</li>
</ul>
